name: Ninja Slash - Color Balls Slicing Free Games
name_original: Ninja Slash - Color Balls Slicing Free Games
description:
The goal is to swipe and slice balls that are launched on to the screen.
This game includes 2 game-modes... One where you just slice as many balls as you can, withing the given time without any penalties. The Second is a game-mode where you cannot miss any of the balls, and there are some obstacles.
